item.title: about
item.description: Projects Speee, Datachain(2017-): Co-founder, CTO, Blockchain engineer Cross: A framework for blockchain interoperability hypermint: Blockchain supports WASM smart contract Plasma chain PoS Freelance Develop high-traffic ad server platform Momentum(2014-2017): Co-founder, CTO Ad verfication, Ad fraud protection Sold to KDDI group company JustSystems(2013): Software engineer Research and develop an application of similar image retrieval during training Develop social commerce, https://bonnestore.com/ Media Blockchain PoC with Toyota: https://prtimes.
